structure.unit: A JUSTICE AND PUBLIC SAFETY CABINET

law.catch_line: Deputy secretaries of justice and public safety.
law.text: Deputy secretaries of justice and public safety shall be appointed by and directly responsible to the secretary and shall be the principal assistants and advisors to the secretary for all policies, programs and operations of the cabinet.
law.history: Amended 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 39, effective June 26, 2007. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 343, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1982. -- Created 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 155, sec. 17, effective July 17, 1978.
